question: India held a webinar along with which country, to boost Defence production and exports?
explanation:
A webinar between India and the UAE has been held under the theme of “Indian Defence Industry Global Outreach for Collaborative Partnership: Webinar and Expo, India – UAE Defence Cooperation”.
The webinar was organised under the aegis of Department of Defence Production, Ministry of Defence, through the Society of Indian Defence Manufacturers. Both the countries agree to promote cooperation in Defence sector through joint production and mutual trade.
